00037                 template <class Type>
00038                 Type return_value_of(std::string name)
00039                 {
00040                         for(int i = 0; i < (int) var_name.size(); i ++)
00041                         {
00042                                 if(name == var_name[i])
00043                                 {
00044                                         Type ret;
00045                                         std::stringstream buffer;
00046                                         buffer << var_value[i]; 
00047                                         buffer >> ret;
00048                                         return ret;
00049                                 }
00050                         }
00051                         std::cerr << "#PARSER: NO VARIABLE WITH NAME " << name << " FOUND!" << std::endl;
00052                         return Type();
00053                 };
00054                 
00055                 template <class Type>
00056                 Type value_of(std::string name) {return return_value_of<Type>(name);}
00057 
00058                 template <class Type>
00059                 Type operator[](std::string name) {return return_value_of<Type>(name);}
00060 
00061                 std::string value_or_default(std::string, std::string);
00062                 
00063                 template <class Type>
00064                 Type value_or_default(std::string name, Type defa)
00065                 {
00066                         for(int i = 0; i < (int) var_name.size(); i ++)
00067                         {
00068                                 if(name == var_name[i])
00069                                 {
00070                                         Type ret;
00071                                         std::stringstream buffer;
00072                                         buffer << var_value[i]; 
00073                                         buffer >> ret;
00074                                         return ret;
00075                                 }
00076                         }
00077                         return defa;
00078                 };
00079 
00080 
00081                 template <class Type>
00082                 void set_value(std::string name, Type value)
00083                 {
00084                         for(uint i = 0; i < var_name.size(); i ++)
00085                                 if(name == var_name[i]) {
00086                                         std::stringstream buffer;
00087                                         buffer << value;
00088                                         var_value[i]=buffer.str();                      
00089                                 }
00090                 };
00091 
00092 
00093                 
00094                 template <class Type>
00095                 std::vector< Type > return_vector(std::string name)
00096                 {
00097                         std::vector< Type > ret;
00098                         for(int i = 0; i < (int) arr_name.size(); i ++)
00099                         {
00100                                 if(name == arr_name[i])
00101                                 {
00102                                         for(int j = 0; j < (int) arr_value[i].size(); j ++)
00103                                         {
00104                                                 Type tmp;
00105                                                 std::stringstream buffer;
00106                                                 buffer << arr_value[i][j];
00107                                                 buffer >> tmp;
00108                                                 ret.push_back(tmp);     
00109                                         }
00110                                 }
00111                         }
00112                         return ret;
00113                 };
00114 
00115                 template <class Type>
00116                 std::vector< Type > vector(std::string name) {return return_vector<Type>(name);}

00123                 std::vector<std::string> arr_name;
00124                 std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > arr_value;
